sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"协定，协议，契约，合同"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: agreement, contract, treaty, convention, bargain, understanding, accord
means: agreement ：普通用词，含义最确定，泛指个人、团体或国家之间取得一致而达成的任何协议、协定或合同、契约等，可以是口头的，也可以是书面的。
contract ：侧重指双方或多方订立的具有法律效力的正式的书面合同或契约。
treaty ：指国家之间经外交谈判后依照国际法签订的正式条约。
convention ：比treaty更专门化，但不及treaty正式。也可指国家之间就有关事情签订的条约。
bargain ：通常指商业交往中的购销合同。
understanding ：指不具约束力的非正式的协议。
accord ：多指国际间的非正式协议。

sentence.Network_en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentence.Network_cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentence.Network_en: We had this understanding that courses were roughly the same weight.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们已经了解到各门功课差不多一样重要。

sentence.Network_en: My understanding was that we'd meet at her place.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的理解是我们在她那儿见面。

means.word_mean: 有同情心的,宽厚的,关心的,容忍的
有才智的,熟练的,精通的,有能力的

entry.def: If you have an understanding of something, you know how it works or know what it means.

example.ex: They have to have a basic understanding of computers in order to use the advanced technology.
example.tran: 要想利用先进技术，他们必须先对计算机有个基本的了解。

entry.tran: 能谅解的；宽容的；通情达理的
entry.def: If you are understanding towards someone, you are kind and forgiving.

example.ex: Her boss, who was very understanding, gave her time off...
example.tran: 她的老板很通情达理，准了她的假。

example.ex: Fortunately for John, he had an understanding wife.
example.tran: 幸运的是，约翰有一个通情达理的妻子。

entry.def: If you show understanding, you show that you realize how someone feels or why they did something, and are not hostile towards them.

example.ex: We would like to thank them for their patience and understanding.
example.tran: 我们要感谢他们的耐心和理解。

entry.def: If there is understanding between people, they are friendly towards each other and trust each other.

example.ex: There was complete understanding between Wilson and myself.
example.tran: 我和威尔逊之间完全能够彼此理解，相互信任。

entry.def: An understanding is an informal agreement about something.

example.ex: We had not set a date for marriage but there was an understanding between us.
example.tran: 我们还没有确定结婚的日子，不过我们对此有一致的想法。

entry.def: If you say that it is your understanding that something is the case, you mean that you believe it to be the case because you have heard or read that it is.

example.ex: It is my understanding that this torture has been going on for many years...
example.tran: 据我了解，这种折磨已经持续很多年了。

example.ex: Our understanding is that they wanted to be in Washington.
example.tran: 我们的理解是，他们想呆在华盛顿。

entry.def: If you agree to do something on the understanding that something else will be done, you do it because you have been told that the other thing will definitely be done.

example.ex: Kevin had treatment on the understanding that he would attempt to overcome his drinking problem.
example.tran: 凯文接受了治疗，但条件是他要努力克服自身的酗酒问题。

means.word_mean: 1. the cognitive condition of someone who understands;

sentences.sentence: "he has virtually no understanding of social cause and effect"

means.word_mean: 2. the statement (oral or written) of an exchange of promises;

sentences.sentence: "they had an agreement that they would not interfere in each other's business"
"there was an understanding between management and the workers"

means.word_mean: 3. an inclination to support or be loyal to or to agree with an opinion;

sentences.sentence: "his sympathies were always with the underdog"
"I knew I could count on his understanding"

means.word_mean: 4. the capacity for rational thought or inference or discrimination;

sentences.sentence: "we are told that man is endowed with reason and capable of distinguishing good from evil"

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by understanding based on comprehension and discernment and empathy;

Sentence.sentence: It will undermine their mutual understanding
The man had difficulty understanding the lecture.
The real test of character is whether we can learn from our mistake, by understanding why we acted as we did and then exploring ways to avoid similar problems in the future.
Social learning theories contribute to our understanding of why we behave as we do, but much of the emphasis is on early socialization rather than on what occurs throughout life.
To promote understanding between China and America.
situations before they happen, you can reach understanding that will help ease you out of confrontations.

means.word_mean: 了解; 相互理解, 谅解; (非正式)协议

sentences.en: This argument aimed at the understanding rather than the emotions.
sentences.cn: 这场辩论针对的是理解而不是感情。

sentences.en: We have reached an understanding with them.
sentences.cn: 我们和他们达成了协议。

sentences.en: His understanding of English is good.
sentences.cn: 他对英语的理解力很好。

sentences.en: We must have a clear understanding of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们对这一问题必须有一个清醒的认识。

means.word_mean: 体谅的; 谅解的; 通情达理的

sentences.en: The youth was fortunate in having understanding parents.
sentences.cn: 这个青年有通情达理的父母, 真幸运。

sentences.en: Because she is understanding, people around her confide in her.
sentences.cn: 因为她通情达理, 周围的人都相信她。

sentences.en: She was understanding about what happened.

jushi.english: We must have a clear understanding of the problem.
jushi.chinese: 我们对这一问题必须有一个清醒的认识。

jushi.english: His understanding of English is good.
